title: Gigantic Stocks Are a Reason to Worry
sub_head: As Apple, Microsoft and Amazon cross the trillion-dollar mark, index investors should be concerned about concentrated portfolios
body:
Remember when a trillion dollars was a lot of money?
With five American companies having touched that astounding level of market value recently and one, Apple , on the cusp of breaching $3 trillion, investors should ask what it means for their portfolios. The precedents arenâ€™t encouraging.
